Class LuaUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.xemiru.luamesh.LuaUtil

  • public class LuaUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for interfacing with Lua objects.

        Shallowly clones a given LuaTable into a new table, and returns it.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the table clone

      • clone

        public static org.luaj.vm2.LuaTable clone(org.luaj.vm2.LuaTable into,
                                          org.luaj.vm2.LuaTable target)
        Shallowly clones a given LuaTable into the provided table, and returns it.
        Parameters:
        into - the table to clone into, or null to use a new table
        target - the table to clone
        Returns:
        into, with the contents of the target table

      • clone

        public static org.luaj.vm2.LuaTable clone(org.luaj.vm2.LuaTable into,
                                          org.luaj.vm2.LuaTable target,
                                          boolean deep)
        Clones a given LuaTable into the provided table, and returns it.
        Parameters:
        into - the table to clone into, or null to use a new table
        target - the table to clone
        deep - whether or not to deep-clone
        Returns:
        into, with the contents of the target table

      • iterate

        public static void iterate(org.luaj.vm2.LuaTable tab,
                           java.util.function.BiConsumer<org.luaj.vm2.LuaValue,org.luaj.vm2.LuaValue> consumer)

      • toJava

        public static java.lang.Object toJava(org.luaj.vm2.LuaValue obj,
                                      boolean flt)
        Turns a Lua object into its corresponding Java object.

        If the object cannot be converted, it is returned as it was given, as a LuaValue.

        Parameters:
        obj - the LuaValue to convert
        flt - whether to convert decimal numbers into floats, otherwise doubles
        Returns:
        the corresponding Java object, or obj if unable to convert

      • toLua

        public static org.luaj.vm2.LuaValue toLua(java.lang.Object obj)
        Converts the provided Java object into its corresponding Lua object.

        A non-primitive object is turned into a LuaObjectValue.

        Arrays are turned into Lua arrays, that is, a table with numerical keys.

        Parameters:
        obj - the object to convert
        Returns:
        the converted object

      • isConvertable

        public static boolean isConvertable(java.lang.Class<?> type)
        Queries whether or not a given type has been registered as a valid Lua-coercible type.
        Parameters:
        type - the type to test
        Returns:
        if the type is considered a valid Lua-coercible type

      • printTable

        public static void printTable(org.luaj.vm2.LuaTable tab)
        Prints the contents of a Lua table in key: value form.

        Keys and values are printed after being passed through Lua's tostring function.

        Parameters:
        tab - the table to print
